items.title: Welcome Livemark - the New Frictionless Data Tool
items.summary: Introducing you to Livemark, the new Frictionless Data tool that allows you to publish data articles easily.

items.title: Announcing New Changes to Our Website
items.summary: We have finished making some new changes that we are very excited to tell you about!

items.title: Frictionless Data May 2021 Virtual Hangout
items.summary: On our last Frictionless Data community call on May 29 we had Simon Tyrrell and Xingdong Bian from the Earlham Institute giving a presentation on Frictionless Data for Wheat.

items.title: Frictionless Data April 2021 Virtual Hangout
items.summary: On our last Frictionless Data community call on April 29 we had an interactive session with our great Frictionless Data Fellows.

items.title: Unveiling the new Frictionless Data documentation portal
items.summary: We invite you all to read our new and improved documentation portal that we created for Frictionless Framework

items.title: Frictionless Data Package for InterMine
items.summary: This blog is part of a series showcasing projects developed during the 2020 Tool Fund.

items.title: Frictionless Data March 2021 Virtual Hangout
items.summary: On our last Frictionless Data community call on March 25th, we dealt with a very current topic thanks to Thorben Westerhuys, who presented his project on Frictionless Vaccination data.

items.title: Frictionless Data for Wheat
items.summary: This blog is part of a series showcasing projects developed during the 2020-2021 Tool Fund. The Tool Fund provided five mini-grants of $5,000 to support individuals or organisations in developing an open tool for reproducible research.

items.title: Frictionless Data February 2021 Virtual Hangout
items.summary: On this February Community Call we had a top notch code demonstration of the new frictionless.py framework by our Frictionless Data senior developer Evgeny Karev.
